name: Remote Racers
description:
Have fun with Remote Racers in five
easy steps:
1. Select one of 8 vehicles: Speeder,
Monster, Candy, Dozer, Tank, Stunt,
Mantis and Rocket.
2. Race against AI or time on 15
great tracks.
3. Jump in the garden, drift through
the cellar, ride on the beach, dive in
the ocean.
4. Use power-ups and transform your
vehicle to gain advantage over your
opponents.
5. Complete 32 Challenges in 8
Championships. Repeat.
